The username or password is incorrect: The username or password is incorrect.
Scanning for channels... This make take: Scanning for channels...this make take some time.
You can now find your Program Guide and: You can now find your Programme Guide and Recording Schedule in the sidebar under "Manage". While we're grabbing the guide data, you can start browsing; it will update automatically as we download what's on.
We're finding the best program guide for: We're finding the best programme guide for your channels and location.
To download an electronic program guide: To download an electronic programme guide we need to know your location.
There was a problem with canceling this: There was a problem with cancelling this subscription. Please try again.
There was an unexpected error loading th: There was an unexpected error loading the Programme Guide
There was a problem analyzing the librar: There was a problem analysing the library.
Analyzes all the media files in the libr: Analyses all the media files in the library. The analysis captures information about the media which helps Plex decide how to optimally play back the media.
There was a problem optimizing this data: There was a problem optimising this database.
There was a problem analysing this item.
There was an unexpected error analyzing: There was an unexpected error analysing an item.
There was a problem optimizing the datab: There was a problem optimising the database.
The server needs a Plex Pass to use sync: A Plex Pass is required to use sync.
Right click the \"Plex It!\" button and: Right click the "Plex It!" button and choose Add to Favourites so you can save videos to Watch Later.
Add the button above to your favorites b: Add the button above to your favourites bar.
Are you sure you want to delete this ver: Are you sure you want to delete this version? You can enable it again in Optimised Versions Settings.
The metadata for this media is invalid. Please reanalyse the media and try again.
This media was unable to be analysed.
Deleting your DVR will remove the Progra: Deleting your DVR will remove the Programme Guide, and all scheduled recordings will be suspended. Programming you've previously recorded will remain in your library.
We're now building your Program Guide: We're now building your Programme Guide
Please verify your channel mappings and: Please verify your channel mappings and refresh the Programme Guide
Subscribe to our amazing, but infrequent: Subscribe to our amazing, but infrequent, email newsletter
Success! Plex Cloud is ready to go. This: Success! Plex Cloud is ready to go. This works just like a normal Plex Media Server. Pick it in the location menu of your favourite Plex app and stream away!
Check the status in {1}Optimized Version: Check the status in {1}Optimised Versions Settings{2}.
Manage your completed conversions in {1}: Manage your completed conversions in {1}Optimised Versions Settings{2}.
All set! Your Plex Media Server is worki: All set! Your Plex Media Server is working hard to find your media and make it beautiful. Grab the Plex app for all your favourite devices to get the most out of Plex and start streaming everywhere!
Plex scans your media, automatically org: Plex scans your media, automatically organises it, and makes it beautiful
Play your media on any screen with your: Play your media on any screen with your favourite Plex app
Plex organizes your media into libraries: Plex organises your media into libraries. You can add as many libraries as you want, and you can have multiple libraries with the same type.
There was a problem preparing for optimi: There was a problem preparing for optimisation.
Video optimization may take a long time: Video optimisation may take a long time to complete on this server. You'll be able to use Plex normally while you wait.
Help us out by following {1}our guide{2}: Help us out by following {1}our guide{2} to naming and organising your media.
Optimized Versions requires Plex Media S: Optimised Versions requires Plex Media Server {1} or later.
Conversions for sync and media optimizat: Conversions for sync and media optimisation will appear here.
Manage your optimized versions in {1}Opt: Manage your optimised versions in {1}Optimised Versions Settings{2}.
Choose \"Optimize...\" on items in your: Choose "Optimise..." on items in your library and optimised versions will appear here.
